William and Lynne Gray’s $3.5m gift to U of Guelph to boost innovation in Canadian poultry sector

Improving innovation and sustainability is the goal of a new $3.5 million gift from the William and Lynne Gray Foundation to the University of Guelph…

Bill Gray nominated to Ontario’s Agricultural Hall of Fame for his work in the Canadian poultry industry

Bill Gray has dedicated his life to innovating the future of food borders. He continuously learns from other leaders through the US and globally…
